claim: Ninjas likely wore clothing that helped them blend into their surroundings, rather than all black as often depicted in popular culture.

supporting.text: Historical records suggest that ninjas often disguised themselves as farmers or merchants, wearing common clothing to avoid detection rather than conspicuous black outfits.
